fields.description: As a cloud user, I would like to be able to detach an ENI from an instance.

comments.body: [~swathi], is this story being worked on for 4.3.0?
[~vasya], is there a reason this was kicked out of 4.3.0? According to [~jbreiding], this feature has been implemented.
[~rusvika], there are two subtasks that has not been completed. [~swathi] said that there she  was planning to finish them. If you think this task is done let's mark is so.

I was hoping [~swathi] could clarify the situation. My understanding is that there were 2 ways to implement this story and one of them has been implemented, so the functionality should work end to end. We need to know whether this feature goes into 4.3.0 or not for testing and documentation purposes.
[~rusvika], one path was implemented end-to-end. The remaining stories are for second path.
[~vasya], OK, then I'm going to put this story into in-QA state for 4.3.0 since it sounds like the feature is ready to be used by customers. Please kick it out if it's not.
[~rusvika], [~vasya], please refer to my first comment on EUCA-11950
